lead_paragraph: As a public company, Etsy is expected to face scrutiny from investors on how much it prioritizes its noble pursuits over its bottom line.

headline.print_headline: Etsy’s I.P.O. Tests Pledge to Do Good
headline.main: Etsy I.P.O. Tests Pledge to Balance Social Mission and Profit

snippet: As a public company, Etsy is expected to face scrutiny from investors on how much it prioritizes its noble pursuits over its bottom line.
abstract: Shares of online marketplace Etsy close at $30 on first day, nearly doubling initial price in one of year's most closely-watched initial public offerings; becomes only the second for-profit 'B Corp' to go public, designation that refers to its commitment to social and environmental accountability; company could face significant challenges as it attempts to balance ethical values with the demands of shareholders.
